message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I believe I can only justify spending up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider lowering the price?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product to you, but I still believe $12,000 is the most I can reasonably spend. Could we possibly meet halfway at $12,750?
